t: Amazon Theater - Wikipedia

t: Amazon Wants to Grow to 16 Theatrical Releases Per Year by 2027
s: August 7, 2024 - Amazon wants to expand to 16 theatrical releases per year by 2027, putting them in the ballpark of other major Hollywood studios' output.

t: Amazon MGM Studios - Wikipedia

t: Amazon MGM To Release 12 To 14 Films Theatrically In 2026, Execs Say
s: March 9, 2025 - Courtenay Valenti said at SXSW that Amazon MGM Studios will release 12-14 films in theaters next year as it ramps up its commitment to the big screen.

t: Amazon to spend $1 billion on theatrical releases, boosting cinema stocks
s: November 23, 2022 - Cinemas stocks got a boost after a report surfaced that Amazon plans to spend $1 billion a year on theatrical film releases.
